attributes.action: Expensive car insurance.Introduce refund at the end of the year.
attributes.additional_details:
On average 1,9 diesel car you pay over 180 pounds a month,depends on where you live,city,street,whats your occupation. What could I say about new drivers?
What should we do?
If there is no accidents/incidents involving you,we want to get back at least 60-70 per cent money we paid.It will be fair.
attributes.background: Expensive car insurance.Have you ever faced it?Does you vehicle costs less than insurance cover?What are we paying for?We spend over 2000 pounds and more every year to cover our vehicle.We get NCD bonus,but with it your insurance isn't cheaper.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Refund policies relating to car insurance are the responsibility of individual insurers.
